ch0358_00_nelke/0101_0701_02_10:
If your Pokémon aren’t feeling their best, I’ve
got you covered.
ch0358_00_nelke/7101_0701_01_10:
The Trainers on Pasio are all so full of
energy!
ch0358_00_nelke/7101_0701_02_10:
It’s so lively here that it’s lifting my
mood, too.
ch0358_00_nelke/7101_0701_03_10:
I guess I should join in and enjoy some
battling, huh?
ch0358_00_nelke/7102_0701_01_10:
Pokémon battling is a timeless way to
connect with others.
ch0358_00_nelke/7102_0701_02_10:
No matter one’s age or status, battling is
something we can all get hooked on...
ch0358_00_nelke/7103_0701_01_10:
When you find yourself in a different role,
your perspective can change.
ch0358_00_nelke/7103_0701_02_10:
And if you’re ever feeling stuck, becoming
a different person might help you find
your way.
ch0358_00_nelke/7104_0701_01_10: Have you met the folks from Team Star?
ch0358_00_nelke/7104_0701_02_10:
They’re all quite sharp-edged, but they’re
a great bunch who care a lot about
each other.
ch0358_00_nelke/7104_0701_03_10: I hope you become good friends with them.
ch0358_00_nelke/7105_0701_01_10:
’Sup, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Today’s
weather is awesome—it’s giving me the ick!
ch0358_00_nelke/7105_0701_02_10: Oh... Did I use that word incorrectly?
ch0358_00_nelke/7105_0701_03_10:
If you don’t mind, could you please teach me
how to correctly use that expression?
ch0358_00_nelke/1701_0701_01_10: ’Sup. There’s something I want to give you.
ch0358_00_nelke/1701_0702_01_10:
No need to thank me. Just use it how
you like.
ch0358_00_nelke/2501_0701_01_10:
Heh... I didn’t think I’d be needing this
disguise again.
ch0358_00_nelke/2501_0701_02_10:
Oh, don’t worry about it. I was talking to
myself.
ch0358_00_nelke/2501_0701_03_10:
If you poke around in places you shouldn’t,
you might get burned, you know.
ch0358_00_nelke/2501_0702_01_10:
Oh, you want to know who I am? Well,
that’s not something I can just spill,
you know.
ch0358_00_nelke/2501_0702_02_10:
As for when I’ll show up again... I can’t
exactly promise that either.
ch0358_00_nelke/2501_0702_04_10:
Whenever someone needs me, that’s when I
make my comeback.
ch0358_00_nelke/2511_0701_01_10: Hey, I want to ask you something.
ch0358_00_nelke/2511_0701_02_10:
Could it be that the pompadour has already
had its day in the sun?
ch0358_00_nelke/2511_0701_03_10:
I barely saw anyone in Paldea with this
hairstyle either, so I was wondering...
ch0358_00_nelke/2511_0701_04_10:
Fashion trends seem to come and go much
more quickly than I thought.
ch0358_00_nelke/2511_0702_01_10:
I feel like a lot of young people on Pasio are
wearing hats.
ch0358_00_nelke/2511_0702_02_10: So are hats in style right now?
ch0358_00_nelke/2511_0702_03_10:
Um, if you’ve got time later, do you want to
check out some hats?
ch0358_00_nelke/3001_0701_01_10:
’Sup. You seem energetic today. Want to
grab some food?
ch0358_00_nelke/3003_0701_01_10:
Looks like you’ve still energy to spare.
Try not to overdo it, though.
ch0358_00_nelke/3005_0701_01_10:
Well done today. I’ll be heading off to
rest now.
